user_register.forms module

class user_register.forms.NewUserForm(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: UserCreationForm

This new class calls the ‘UserCreationForm’, which is a pre-built register form from Django connected to the pre-built model ‘User’. This form then is customised by adding ‘email’ and ‘first_name’ fields to it.

user_register.views module

user_register.views.register_success(request)[source]
user_register.views.user_register(request)[source]

There are two checking in this function: 1- The first checks if the form is being posted 2- The second checks if the form is valid

If both check’s results are True, then the form information will be saved under a user,

he/she will be logged in and re-direct to register_sucess page eventually.
